item.content:
Now it’s time to say goodbye to WordPress. I have bought a virtual machine for several years on Tencent Cloud(1Core/1G/1Mbps). It’s totally enough for my site with no comments. So, Since there’s no comment, why do I need a vm to host a dynamic site?

ðŸ˜”What I need is just a static page.ðŸ˜”

Here are several tools I used to make this change:

Tools Description
Bitnami Wordpress It contains everything you need to launch a WordPress, such as httpd,mysql,php.
All-in-One Wp Migration Export the previous data and import them into the new WordPress instance.
github.io and github custom domain You can use github.io to host the content of the site and it’s custom domain feature keep my domain leojin.com continually working. This site’s repo is here.
Hugo Offical site: The worldâ€™s fastest framework for building websites.
Terminal A hugo theme which is what you see now.

Below is my local replica preview. I won’t miss u, so it has been shut down forever.

Bye WordPress.

Hello Hugo & Github.io.
